name: habitica
description: Habitica is a gamified task manager based on role-playing game mechanics. Users complete real-life tasks to level up, earn rewards, and battle monsters. It supports both self-hosted setup and hosted service tiers.

features.title: Gamification
features.description: RPG-style task system, Level up characters, Earn rewards. Make productivity fun

features.title: Habits
features.description: Daily habit tracking, Streak counting, Positive reinforcement. Build better routines

features.title: Dailies
features.description: Recurring tasks, Flexible schedules, Completion tracking. Stay consistent

features.title: To-Do Tasks
features.description: One-time tasks, Priority levels, Due dates. Get things done

features.title: Rewards
features.description: Custom rewards, In-game purchases, Motivation system. Treat yourself

features.title: Social Features
features.description: Join parties, Guild quests, Challenge friends. Stay accountable together

features.title: Pets & Mounts
features.description: Collect creatures, Hatch eggs, Feed pets. Build your collection

features.title: Classes
features.description: Warrior, Mage, Rogue, Healer, Unique abilities. Choose your path
